decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (FLU.526.01M, FLU.526.02, FLU.526.03, FLU.526.04N, FLU.526.06S & FLU.526.07, received on 18/09/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The extensions and accommodation hereby approved shall be used solely as part of the house known as 132 Bath Road and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling nor used for business purposes and the premises shall not be used as a house in multiple occupation, including any use within Class C4 of The Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended) or such other legislation as may subsequently supersede it.

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the approved plans, the windows formed at first floor in the east (side) elevation shall be obscure glazed, fixed opening and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured fixed glazing.
description: Erection of a two storey side infill, a part two storey side, a single storey rear and a first floor rear extension to the house
